Text: The Green Age of Asher Witherow is the debut novel of M. Allen Cunningham, published in 2004.

Text: The Green Age of Asher Witherow:  The story is framed as a memoir of sorts, penned by the elderly Witherow in the spring of 1950, long after the book's events occurred, and many years after the community of Nortonville ceased to exist.
